Commentary.Commentary: First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Attempt blocked. Badou Ndiaye (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Joe Allen.
Attempt blocked. Aaron Lennon (Burnley) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Stephen Ward with a cross.

Commentary.Commentary: Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Badou Ndiaye.
Attempt blocked. Kevin Long (Burnley) header from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Johann Berg Gudmundsson with a cross.
Goal!  Stoke City 1, Burnley 0. Badou Ndiaye (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Mame Biram Diouf.
Offside, Stoke City. Glen Johnson tries a through ball, but Moritz Bauer is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Ashley Barnes (Burnley) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Ashley Westwood.
